title.rendered: Accountants Pick Fundbox As Their Leading Funding Solution For The Second Year In a Row

content.rendered:
The attendees at Accountex USA have spoken and, for the second year in a row Fundbox has been awarded the User Favorite Award for business funding.

Accountex USA is the leading independent, educational conference on accounting technology, offering three days of learning focused around the solutions that move accounting forward. Sessions are taught by experts, resulting in a high-caliber learning experience with real-world lessons and practical takeaways that can be implemented seamlessly.

The User Favorite Awards showcase companies that provide the most productive and effective technologies and meet the highest standards of design, ease-of-use, and conformance with appropriate accounting standards.  Out of hundreds of nominees, the winners are selected by a cumulative scoring system rather than the vendor that receives the most votes; users must rank the solutions they use on a 5-star system so that the winners are recognized on reported client satisfaction. It is designed to recognize the solutions that are truly the favorite of the people who use them regularly.  

“We couldn’t be more excited to receive the Accountex USA User Favorite Award for the second year in a row.” said Joanna Knox, Business Development Manager at Fundbox. “Accountants are the trusted advisors for small business, so this form of validation coming from their community is awesome!”

Brian Cuthbert, Group Vice President of Accountex USA, explained the significance of the awards program: “The User Favorite Awards are unique in that it doesn’t just recognize the largest company with the most users. It honors the solutions that have the happiest clients. It creates a true user satisfaction award rather than a popularity contest and on the most expansive ecosystem available today. It is truly inclusive of all accounting technology systems.”
